short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Add the PR body to Github files view

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension adds a button to toggle viewing the PR body when on the files page of a Github pull request. This is useful for when you want quickly view the PR body without changing tabs or windows.
